ReportFactory
service in module DebtCalculator

Description

Creates and manages report data based on data in the AccountFactory

Methods

  • calculateTotalBalance(accounts)

    Returns the sum of the current balances of the accounts specified

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    accountsarray

    The accounts to sum

  • runReport(reportType)

    Executes the report based on the given parameters and sets the factory.reportData property with the results

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    reportTypeObject
    • The reportType object to run the report against

  • runReport(reportType)

    Executes the report based on the given parameters and sets the factory.reportData property with the results

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    reportTypeObject

    The reportType object to run the report against

Properties

  • chartSeries

    The unique data series and their respective data, which will be used to generate the chart

    Returns
    array

    The series to be used in the chart

  • reportData

    Contains all the information generated after runReport() is executed

    Returns
    array

    The generated report information after runReport() is executed

  • reportTypes

    The valid report types to execute a report against

    Returns
    array

    The valid reportTypes

  • reportTypes

    The months generated by the report, which will be used on the X-axis of the report

    Returns
    array

    The months to be used in the chart
